mutants.code:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def detect_anomaly(data):
    mean_1 = np.mean(data['temperature'])
    mean_2 = np.mean(data['pressure'])
    sd_1 = np.std(data['temperature'])
    cutoff = sd_1 / 3
    lower_limit_temperature = mean_1 - cutoff
    upper_limit_temperature = mean_1 + cutoff
    lower_limit_pressure = mean_2 - np.std(data['pressure']) * 3
    upper_limit_pressure = mean_2 + np.std(data['pressure']) * 3
    data['anomaly'] = 0
    data.loc[(data['temperature'] < lower_limit_temperature) | (data['temperature'] > upper_limit_temperature) | (data['pressure'] < lower_limit_pressure) | (data['pressure'] > upper_limit_pressure), 'anomaly'] = 1
    return data

import pandas as pd

def detect_anomaly(data):

    mean_2 = np.mean(data['pressure'])
    sd_1 = np.std(data['temperature'])

    lower_limit_pressure = mean_2 * (np.std(data['pressure']) * 3)

    data['anomaly'] = 0
    data.loc[(data['temperature'] < lower_limit_temperature) | (data['temperature'] > upper_limit_temperature) | (data['pressure'] < lower_limit_pressure) | (data['pressure'] > upper_limit_pressure), 'anomaly'] = 1
    return data

import pandas as pd

def detect_anomaly(data):
    mean_1 = np.mean(data['temperature'])
    mean_2 = np.mean(data['pressure'])
    sd_1 = np.std(data['temperature'])
    cutoff = sd_1 * 3
    lower_limit_temperature = mean_1 - cutoff
    upper_limit_temperature = mean_1 + cutoff
    lower_limit_pressure = mean_2 - np.std(data['pressure']) * 0
    upper_limit_pressure = mean_2 + np.std(data['pressure']) * 3
    data['anomaly'] = 0
    data.loc[(data['temperature'] < lower_limit_temperature) | (data['temperature'] > upper_limit_temperature) | (data['pressure'] < lower_limit_pressure) | (data['pressure'] > upper_limit_pressure), 'anomaly'] = 1
    return data
